member.name: P:PostmarkDotNet.TemplatedPostmarkMessage.TemplateModel
member.summary:
The values to merge with the template when creating the content.
The message sending API requires that this be an *object* as described by the JSON specification.
This means that you can assign a Dictionary<K,V> to this property. The dictionary may contain any keys and or objects that can be serialized to JSON.
Additionally, POCOs and anonymous types can be assigned to this property, provided they can be serialized to JSON (we use JSON.net internally).
Objects that would be serialized as "JSON scalars" or arrays should *not* be assigned to this property. (They MAY be set as values on the TemplateModel, though)
See this guide for more information on how this model is used, and how Postmark Templates work: http://support.postmarkapp.com/article/786-using-a-postmark-starter-template

member.name: T:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType
member.summary: Represents the type of Bounce. More details: - http://developer.postmarkapp.com/developer-api-bounce.html#bounce-types

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.HardBounce
member.summary: Hard bounce The server was unable to deliver your message (ex: unknown user, mailbox not found).

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.Transient
member.summary: Message delayed The server could not temporarily deliver your message (ex: Message is delayed due to network troubles).

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.Unsubscribe
member.summary: Unsubscribe request Unsubscribe or Remove request.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.Subscribe
member.summary: Subscribe request Subscribe request from someone wanting to get added to the mailing list.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.AutoResponder
member.summary: Auto responder Automatic email responder (ex: "Out of Office" or "On Vacation").

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.AddressChange
member.summary: Address change The recipient has requested an address change.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.DnsError
member.summary: DNS error A temporary DNS error.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.SpamNotification
member.summary: Spam notification The message was delivered, but was either blocked by the user, or classified as spam, bulk mail, or had rejected content.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.OpenRelayTest
member.summary: Open relay test The NDR is actually a test email message to see if the mail server is an open relay.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown Unable to classify the NDR.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.SoftBounce
member.summary: Soft bounce Unable to temporarily deliver message (i.e. mailbox full, account disabled, exceeds quota, out of disk space).

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.VirusNotification
member.summary: Virus notification The bounce is actually a virus notification warning about a virus/code infected message.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.ChallengeVerification
member.summary: Spam challenge verification The bounce is a challenge asking for verification you actually sent the email. Typcial challenges are made by Spam Arrest, or MailFrontier Matador.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.BadEmailAddress
member.summary: Invalid email address The address is not a valid email address.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.SpamComplaint
member.summary: Spam complaint The subscriber explicitly marked this message as spam.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.ManuallyDeactivated
member.summary: Manually deactivated The email was manually deactivated.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.Unconfirmed
member.summary: Registration not confirmed The subscriber has not clicked on the confirmation link upon registration or import.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.Blocked
member.summary: ISP block Blocked from this ISP due to content or blacklisting.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.SMTPApiError
member.summary: SMTP API error An error occurred while accepting an email through the SMTP API.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.InboundError
member.summary: Processing failed Unable to deliver inbound message to destination inbound hook.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.DMARCPolicy
member.summary: DMARC Policy Email rejected due DMARC Policy.

member.name: F:PostmarkDotNet.PostmarkBounceType.TemplateRenderingFailed
member.summary: Template rendering failed An error occurred while attempting to render your template.
